Steps.StepString: Looking at the HTML of the website, we can see that both red and blue buttons make a request to the same URL, however with different HTTP request methods.
Guessing that the flag will be accessible by using a different HTTP request method.
Trying HTTP requests with different request methods using Burp Suite.
Examining the MDN Web Docs to see the 9 different HTTP request methods, including 'HEAD'.
Making the assumption to use the 'HEAD' method to get the flag based on the challenge name.
